title: Jackson Crime Map
name: Jackson Crime Map
description:
A Map by Abreviks

Map of crimes committed in Jackson, MS from July 2, 2007.

properties.description: Posted by Abreviks115 Cottonwood Drive, Jackson, MS

properties.name: Armed Robbery at 5319 N I-55
properties.description: Posted by Abreviks5319 N I-55, Jackson, MSJackson Police are looking for the man who walked into a liquor store along Interstate 55 Thursday night, flashed a weapon and swiped an unknown amount of cash.The armed robbery happened about 7:30 p.m. inside the Liquor Connection. No injuries were reported.

properties.name: Bank Robbery at 947 N. State St.
properties.description: Posted by Abreviks947 N. State St., Jackson, MS

properties.name: Dead Body Found at 500 Farish St.
properties.description: Posted by Abreviks500 Farish St, Jackson, MSBody of 27-year-old Larry Darnell Nelson was found in vacate lot shot at least once in chest.

properties.name: Fatal Shooting at 1253 Wood Village Dr.
properties.description: Posted by Abreviks 1253 Wood Village Dr, Jackson, MSMarquelle Marshall, 21, died from multiple gunshot wounds. Jermaine Marshall, 18, also suffered multiple wounds, , said JPD spokesman Sgt. Jeffery Scott. Jermaine Marshall is being treated at the University of Mississippi Medical Center.

properties.name: Fatal Shooting at 3001 Jayne Ave.
properties.description: Posted by Abreviks3001 Jayne Ave, Jackson, MSDamien Phillips was shot once in the chest about 1:56 a.m on July 22, 2007.

properties.name: Fatal Shooting at 760 Willow St.
properties.description: Posted by Abreviks760 Willow St., Jackson, MSShadoe Love of Jackson was fatally wounded inside an apartment at Willow Court Apartments, 760 Willow St., in south Jackson apartment. Love was shot once in the head.

properties.name: Fatal Shooting at 987 East Northside Dr.
properties.description: Posted by Abreviks 987 East Northside Drive, Jackson, MSJackson police are investigating a shooting at Hallmark Gardens Apartments, 987 East Northside Drive, that left one man dead and another with multiple wounds.

properties.name: Robbery at 830 Cooper Road
properties.description: Posted by Abreviks830 Cooper Road, Jackson, MSThe Family Dollar at 830 Cooper Road was robbed about 8 p.m., said Jackson Police Department spokesman Sgt. Jeffery Scott. [from Clarion-Ledger: http://www.clarionledger.com/apps/pbcs.dll/article?AID=/20070705/NEWS/70705039/1263/rss

properties.name: Shooting at 115 Cottonwood Drive
properties.description: Posted by Abreviks115 Cottonwood Drive, Jackson, MSPaul Trimble, 24, of Jackson suffered a gunshot wound at the Horseman Blues Club. He was taken to UMC by private vehicle. His injuries were not considered life-threatening.

properties.name: Shooting at 168 Longino St.
properties.description: Posted by Abreviks168 Longino St., Jackson, MSTwo men were in the parking lot of an apartment complex at 168 Longino St. when the shooting occurred. An argument over a woman is believed to be the motive

properties.name: Shooting at 1855 Lakeland Drive
properties.description: Posted by Abreviks1855 Lakeland Drive, Jackson, MSShooting at Mugshots Grill & Bar. Joseph “Chad” Roberts of Brandon was shot once in the buttocks and once in the upper thigh, the release said. The shooting was believed to be the result of an altercation with another patron.

properties.name: Shooting at 300 Memphis Street
properties.description: Posted by AbreviksA nine-year-old girl was wounded in an overnight shooting in Jackson.

properties.name: Shooting at 3930 Skyview Dr.
properties.description: Posted by Abreviks 3930 Skyview Drive, Jackson, MSA man was shot in the thigh at Christian Brotherhood Apartments. He has taken to a local hospital. His name and condition have not been released. Police are looking for three or four men in a red Ford Excursion who allegedly shot the man. The shooting was reported at 1:37 p.m.

properties.name: Shooting at 5764 Brownlee Drive
properties.description: Posted by Abreviks5764 Brownlee DriveJackson man was shot twice in the chest
